sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>6</base_damage> <critical_rating>2</critical_rating> <defense/> <description>Produced by Antrech Arms, a BlasTech subsidiary which produced niche blasters, the DE-10 was easy to maintain, classy, and made of the best materials for endurance. It came standard with a telescopic optical sight.  Reduce difficulty of combat checks at long and extreme range by 1.  Do not add 1 setback dice due to minor repairs needed.  Add 1 boost dice to checks for repairing the blaster.</description> <encumbrance>1</encumbrance> <hard_points>2</hard_points> <hp_required/> <name>DE-10 Blaster Pistol</name> <number>GEAR0001180</number> <price>1400</price> <range>long</range> <rarity>6</rarity> <skill_used display_value="Ranged - Light (Ag)">d290dd5cdbae88542901de90cf9619a6</skill_used> <soak/> <sys_class_name>x_176383_star_wars_gear</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>ben.fisher</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-01-02 09:18:28</sys_created_on> <sys_id>db70e78c2fed6050e0f497eef699b65b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>ben.fisher</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-01-02 09:18:28</sys_updated_on> <type>weapon</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
